comments.creator: tlong@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Currently [we are using the test-support component](https://github.com/mozilla/glean/blob/36b4871db7d83fd80852d4cc2264b870346ca611/glean-core/android/build.gradle#L210) in Glean.  Our [current dependency version](https://github.com/mozilla/glean/blob/36b4871db7d83fd80852d4cc2264b870346ca611/build.gradle#L14) is only at v15 which is way behind the times.  We should either update or refactor to remove the dependency on Android-Components.
comments.text: Currently [we are using the test-support component](https://github.com/mozilla/glean/blob/36b4871db7d83fd80852d4cc2264b870346ca611/glean-core/android/build.gradle#L210) in Glean.
